ygData.subject: Re: {quests} questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The bashers of Grobb glower at me, even though I ve done nothing to lower my initial faction with them.  I seem to remeber last time I hit the bank in
ygData.messageBody:
Shanti Ashtangi wrote:
>
> From: "Shanti Ashtangi" <zealpath@...>
>
> Speaking of quests, some may wish to try the Helm of Hukulk quest which
> begings in Grobb by talking to the SK guildmaster, Hukulk.
> This helm raises STR and AGI by 3, and is only wearable by the evil races
> (sorry humans you miss out on this one).
> I'm a Dark Elf SK and I managed to get the helm, so let me tell you that
> this quest is very worth completing.
> If you can't figure it out you can always hit EQ'Lizer too hehe.
> (it does require you to be about level 20 tho)
>

The bashers of Grobb glower at me, even though I've done nothing to
lower my initial faction with them. I seem to remeber last time
I hit the bank in Grobb that someone was glaring or scowling at me,
but I might have been mistaken. Are the SK's there friendly to our kind
by default, or must I raise my faction somehow?

Xilith
